wfSignature.title: Whiteflag Authentication Signature
wfSignature.description: Flattened JWS JSON Serialization of a Whiteflag authentication signature
wfSignature.$comment: Flattened JWS JSON Serialization objects are defined in RFC 7515

protected.description: Encoded signature header to identify which algorithm is used to generate the signature

payload.description: Encoded payload with the information as defined in the Whiteflag protocol specification

signature.description: The digital signature validating the information contained in the payload

wfSignPayload.title: Whiteflag Authentication Signature payload
wfSignPayload.description: Payload object of a Whiteflag authentication signature

addr.title: Blockchain address
addr.description: The blockchain address used to send the corresponding `A1` message and of which the corresponding private key is used to create the signature

orgname.title: Originator name
orgname.description: The name of the originator, which can be chosen freely

url.title: Signature URL
url.description: The same URL as in the `VerificationData` field of the corresponding `A1` message

extpubkey.title: Extended HD Public Key
extpubkey.description: The serialised extended parent public key from which the child public keys and addresses used by this originator can be derived (currently not supported)

wfSignDecoded.title: Decoded Whiteflag Authentication Signature
wfSignDecoded.description: Object with a decoded Whiteflag authentication signature

header.description: Signature header to identify which algorithm is used to generate the signature

signature.description: The digital signature validating the information contained in the payload

wfExtSignature.title: Extended Whiteflag Authentication Signature object
wfExtSignature.description: Whiteflag authentication signature with additional information for verification
